name: h3
description: The 2026 Marucci CATX RCKLESS Composite Drop 10 USA Baseball Bat is designed for players seeking a powerful and responsive swing. With a drop 10 length-to-weight ratio and a slightly end-loaded swing feel, this bat offers a perfect balance of speed and power. Its 2 3/4-inch barrel diameter, combined with a FLEX Composite Barrel, ensures maximum performance and responsiveness on every hit. The OLS Connection minimizes vibrations for smooth swings, while the TFX End Cap provides increased forgiveness. Featuring a striking black, teal, and purple colorway, this USA Baseball Certified bat also includes a PFX Composite Handle and Custom Knob Design for enhanced speed, power, and feel. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Delivery: Free & Fast Shipping on all orders
Warranty: Full twelve (12) months through the manufacturer
Ring-Free Barrel Construction: Enhances barrel flex & overall bat production
FLEX Composite Barrel: Ensures max performance & barrel responsiveness
OLS Connection: Stiffest connection that reduces vibrations for smooth swings
TFX End Cap: Softer end cap increases forgiveness
PFX Composite Handle: Engineered by bat drop enhancing speed, power, & feel
Custom Knob Design: Optimized knob shape for each drop for better feel
Enhanced Soft Touch Grip: Enhances feel & control
